snippet.title: Mechabellum - Official Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Mechabellum is available now in Steam Early Access. Check ou the latest trailer for another look at this multiplayer auto-battler game that puts you in command of a mech army. 

In Mechabellum, plan out strategies and units, balance offense and defense, upgrade your units, and watch as your army attempts to triumph over your opponent. Each round is a chance for the tides of battle to turn, and one small change in your strategy could be the difference between an epic victory or crushing defeat.
